summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2017 JEEP CHEROKEE. WHILE DRIVING 65 MPH WITH THE CRUISE CONTROL ACTIVATED, THE VEHICLE INDEPENDENTLY ACCELERATED AND THE ENGINE REVVED. AFTER APPLYING THE BRAKES, THE VEHICLE RESUMED NORMAL SPEED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED. THE LOCAL DEALER (STEPHENS CHRYSLER JEEP DODGE RAM 200 NORTH STREET, BENNINGTON, VT, 05201) WAS CONTACTED AND REFERRED THE CONTACT TO NHTSA. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 9,700.
